verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Our life we touch is altered
By the imprint of our hand
We help to mold and make them

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
To become what God has planned
But we must choose to focus
On the things that are the best
To make each life a vessel
That God can truly bless

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
I want to fill my life with knowledge
of the universe God made
Teach my mind to reason
and my spirit to obey

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
But if I fail to know God loves me
I've miss the most important part
The heart of the matter
Is the matter of the heart

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
My soul is touched by friendships
that will last eternally
The faces that shared laughter
the joyful memories
But Jesus taught the lesson

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
There's no greater love than this
That a man would lay his life down
And give it for his friends
